title: Huntsville Area Crime Stoppers hits 15,000 cases solved, over $13.8M in property, drugs recovered
text:
Published By: Al.com: Huntsville - Today 
(File photo) Huntsville's local Crime Stoppers chapter recently hit a milestone - more than 15,000 cases solved. The Huntsville ...
